member.name: DML_LP_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: Performs an Lp-normalization function along the specified axis of the input tensor.

member.name: DML_LP_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The tensor containing the input data.

member.name: DML_LP_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The tensor to write the results to. This tensor's Sizes should match the InputTensor.

member.name: DML_LP_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Axis
member.summary: The axis on which to apply normalization.

member.name: DML_LP_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Epsilon
member.summary: The epsilon value to use to avoid division by zero. A value of 0.00001 is recommended as default.

member.name: DML_LP_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.P
member.summary: The order of the normalization (either 1 or 2).
